text:
Filters
Now select level of care you wish to see. Note all values are taken at the Midnight Census.

viewof islands = Inputs.select(data.map(d => d.County), {
  multiple: true, 
  label: "County", 
  initialValue: "Alamance",
  sort: true, 
  unique: true})
